subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The presence of LeBron James and the Cavaliers triggered a larger-than-normal crowd of 17,569 at the Izod Center, and an all-too-typical result in a Nets loss.
snippet: The presence of LeBron James and the Cavaliers triggered a larger-than-normal crowd of 17,569 at the Izod Center, and an all-too-typical result in a Nets loss.
